paragraph.paragraph: This section of the documentation covers the tools installed and used with EiffelEnvision.

../../eiffelbuild/index.xml EiffelVision 2 Graphical Designer (EiffelBuild)
A complete overview of the EiffelBuild graphical designer for building EiffelVision 2 graphical user interfaces.

../using_eiffelenvision/eiffelenvision_for_eiffelstudio_developers/conversion_tool/index.xml EiffelStudio to EiffelEnvision Project Conversion Tool
The project conversion tool installed with EiffelEnvision to import/convert a classic Eiffel or Eiffel for .NET project into EiffelEnvision and Visual Studio .NET.

../../compliance_checker/index.xml Eiffel for .NET Compliance Checker
An complete usage guide to the Eiffel for .NET Compliance Checker tool; A validation tool used to check third party assemblies for CLS and Eiffel compliance so you will clearly see what can and cannot be used in and assembly, in Eiffel for .NET.
